author: markekraus
body:
Reference #5610 

This moves the partial class into a single file each. This code is purposely not sorted and the formatting is left alone to make this easier to review. There are cleanup actions planned in the referenced Issue.

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body: @iSazonov let me know if this is easier to work with.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Yes, it is more easy. I spent one hour to review the code. Thanks.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Doc tests failed again on WMF links. I think we could run doc tests with separate test tag. And maybe run some tests on demand by test tag.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: I restarted the mac tests, but they failed in webCmdLets.  If they fail again, can you investigate @markekraus

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body: It looks like it has been too long since the last commit to restart the the CI. I will push an empty commit.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: 😄 Our tests resemble a pinball machine in a casino.

title: Combine Web Cmdlet Partial Class Files
